column1: The Pit Room////Food:  We ordered 1/2lb beef brisket
column3: mac and cheese and the potatoes salad.  The beef brisket was very flavorful
column4: tender and not overly salty.  The half chicken was flavorful
column5: but the white meat was fairly dry.  The mac and cheese was mediocre
column6: thin and runny.  The potato salad was better
column8: but nothing earth shattering.  I'd definitely come back to try some of the other meats.
